text: Vicky Longomba in 1960 Victor Longomba Besange Lokuli, commonly known as Vicky Longomba, (December 13, 1932 – March 12, 1988 in Kinshasawww.congolite.ca) was a singer and a founding member of Tout puissant OK Jazz, a Congolese rumba group.Franco: National Geographic World Music He later formed his own group, Lovy du Zaire. He was the father of Lovy Longomba (member of Super Mazembe) and Awilo Longomba, both popular musicians. ==References== Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo singers Category:TPOK Jazz members Category:1932 births Category:1988 deaths Category:20th-century singers
title: Vicky Longomba
